title: How to Draw Weed from Ginga Densetsu Weed

steps.headline: Draw a circle, but it doesn't have to be perfect.
steps.description: In fact, make it a little like an oval.

steps.headline: Draw two little circles at the top of Weed's head.
Then draw two shapes under the circles.
steps.description: These shapes should look like the front of a mailbox. Then add two pupils. We'll make these more detailed later.

steps.headline: Then draw an upside-down triangle for Weed's nose.
steps.description: For shine effect, draw a line dividing the top from the rest of the nose. Keep this white. Then split the other half down the middle and shade the right-hand-side gray. Color the other side black.

steps.headline: To draw Weed's muzzle, just draw a box-like shape around his nose.
steps.description: Erase the top. Then, connect each side of the muzzle to his forehead with outward-sloping fashion. Color all this white.

steps.headline: Draw a smile by drawing a regular smile on the side of you choice.
steps.description: Don't draw the other side yet. Add pointy teeth and a tongue. Then slope the other side of the mouth "behind" it.

steps.headline: Make his ears small and pointy.
Draw his neck and chest next.
steps.description: Make chest look slightly muscular by drawing a kite shape, but don't connect the corners.

steps.headline: Draw his legs, and make "socks" on the legs.
Draw his body slightly behind him.
steps.description: Make his back legs kind of like the front ones. Make his tail bushy and curly. Draw socks on his back legs too.

steps.headline: Make the circles above his eyes white, the insides of his ears, his socks, part of his chest, and his complete underside (even his tail) white.
Make his irises aquamarine.
steps.description: Add little spots of white for shine effect.

steps.headline: Color the rest of his fur blue.
steps.description: Add any additional touches. Congratulations, you just drew Weed! !

text: Draw a circle, but it doesn't have to be perfect. In fact, make it a little like an oval. Draw two little circles at the top of Weed's head.  Then draw two shapes under the circles. These shapes should look like the front of a mailbox. Then add two pupils. We'll make these more detailed later. Then draw an upside-down triangle for Weed's nose. For shine effect, draw a line dividing the top from the rest of the nose. Keep this white. Then split the other half down the middle and shade the right-hand-side gray. Color the other side black. To draw Weed's muzzle, just draw a box-like shape around his nose. Erase the top. Then, connect each side of the muzzle to his forehead with outward-sloping fashion. Color all this white. Draw a smile by drawing a regular smile on the side of you choice. Don't draw the other side yet. Add pointy teeth and a tongue. Then slope the other side of the mouth "behind" it. Make his ears small and pointy.  Draw his neck and chest next. Make chest look slightly muscular by drawing a kite shape, but don't connect the corners. Draw his legs, and make "socks" on the legs.  Draw his body slightly behind him. Make his back legs kind of like the front ones. Make his tail bushy and curly. Draw socks on his back legs too. Make the circles above his eyes white, the insides of his ears, his socks, part of his chest, and his complete underside (even his tail) white.  Make his irises aquamarine. Add little spots of white for shine effect. Color the rest of his fur blue. Add any additional touches. Congratulations, you just drew Weed! !
